title: NISE Notification 2025 - Apply Online for 05 Executive Assistant Posts
description: The National Institute of Solar Energy (NISE) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 05 Executive Assistant Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Any Degree, Diploma, and B.E./B. Tech can apply for the NISE Notification 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, select...
